snippet: Chinese state-controlled media expressed a certain contempt for Chen Guangcheng and U.S. involvement in his case, saying Thursday that he was merely a village lawyer whose role as a human rights advocate had been concocted and inflated by Western...
abstract: Chinese state-controlled media expressed a certain contempt for Chen Guangcheng and U.S. involvement in his case, saying Thursday that he was merely a village lawyer whose role as a human rights advocate had been concocted and inflated by Western media and diplomats. Once again, they suggested, China was being made out to be the villain.

headline.main: Chinese Media Decry Western Interference in Chen Case
